page.title: 18CASSOP COMMUNITY CENTRE.
page.content: The Community Centre is built in the centre of Cassop. Lots of events are held there including discos coffee mornings over 60's and jumble sales. At the moment the centre is getting an extension put on. It is being made bigger so they can have games for the children. The discos are run by Mr. T. Wilson. He has run them for a long time. there are 2 discos, one for the young children and one for the older children. It is the only entertainment in the village for children .The community raises money by having coffee mornings and jumble sales. The money also goes to Cassop Sports Day. We the older children had a sponsored walk which was 12 miles. If you went you got a free seat on the bus which went to Scarbourgh on the disco trip.
